item.title: Publications
item.description: Ph.D. Thesis Here is my Ph.D. thesis manuscript. You can find the corresponding slides there, and a video recording of the defense itself there. Journal Divol, V. (2022). Measure estimation on manifolds: an optimal transport approach. Probability Theory and Related Fields. journal Divol, V. (2021). Minimax adaptive estimation in manifold inference. Electronic Journal of Statistics. journal Divol, V., & Lacombe, T. (2021). Understanding the topology and the geometry of the space of persistence diagrams via optimal partial transport.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This Spring, I am teaching with Carlos Fernandez-Granda the Mathematical Tools for Data Science course in the Master’s in Data Science at NYU (DS-GA 1013). Mathematical Tools for Data Science (Spring 2022) Week Lecture notes Manuscript notes Homeworks Solutions 1 Empirical risk minimization Manuscript 1 Homework 1 Solution 1 2 Convex optimization Manuscript 2 Homework 2 Solution 2 3 Kernel methods Manuscript 3 Homework 3 4 Local averaging methods Manuscript 4 Homework 4
